name: World Tour - Flying on Real 3D Maps
summary: Get ready for the adventure of a lifetime! In World Tour, you can hop into a helicopter, float up high in a hot air balloon, or zoom on a magic carpet to explore incredible cities and famous spots. With over 53 amazing cities and 23 wonders of the world awaiting you to visit, you'll see these places in 3D, like they're right in front of you, and learn all about their special landmarks. It's like going on a thrilling journey without ever leaving your home!
